A4.text: The Warriors won the inaugural Basketball Association of America (BAA) championship in 1947

A5.text: The Warriors won their first NBA championship on the West Coast in 1974–75

A6.text: The Golden State Warriors last made the NBA Finals in 1967, when they were still in San Francisco.

A7.text: The Warriors won a championship in the 1955–56 season.

A8.text: The Warriors won their first NBA championship in the 1946–47 season.
